code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import'./RestaurantPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RestaurantPage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[restaurant,setRestaurant]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchRestaurant=async()=>{const response=await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/api/restaurants/${id}`);setRestaurant(response.data);};fetchRestaurant();},[id]);if(!restaurant)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"restaurant-detail-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"restaurant-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:restaurant.featured_image,alt:restaurant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:restaurant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"address",children:restaurant.location.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"city",children:restaurant.location.city}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"country",children:restaurant.location.country}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{children:"Cuisines:"})," ",Array.isArray(restaurant.cuisines)?restaurant.cuisines.join(', '):restaurant.cuisines]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"rating",children:["Rating: ",restaurant.user_rating.aggregate_rating]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"reviews",children:["Reviews: ",restaurant.user_rating.rating_text]})]})});};export default RestaurantPage;
